about_the_game:
Welcome to We are Blob, a point-and-click game that follows a game developing blobfish as they try to complete making a game in a week, while balancing their personal life. As Blob you will work on tasks for your new job, go on dates, see your mom, and hang out with your friends. All of this while maintaining your health, stress, and hunger.

Features:
-Cute and Colorful 2D Art
-Quirky and Full Narrative
-Cozy and Head Bopping Music

Quote:

"All work and no play makes Blob a dead Blob" - Final Boss, 2024

short_description: Hello! Hey! Yeah, you! The one behind the computer! Welcome to We are Blob, a chill and cozy point-and-click game that follows our main hero...BLOB! Help Blob navigate their new job as a game developer while trying not to get fired. You only have ONE week to finish this game so...no pressure!
